channel.title: Seting a projectile to a spell
channel.description:
how i set a projectile to a spell ???
i put in frnt of the stillgfx(111, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
stillprojectile ?
and how i make MY player do a gfx during the spell ?
